title: Paris Heritage Art Deco Elegance Minutes from Eiffel Tower with Daily Breakfast
description:
Hidden within the striking wraparound facade of a 1930s telephone exchange, Le Cinq Codet has been transformed into a stylish see-and-be-seen haven in the heart of Paris. Enjoy luxurious amenities like the lush Sundari Spa, the chic Chiquette restaurant where you’ll savour a daily breakfast spread of quintessential French delights, a deluxe fitness centre, a quaint patio and bar nestled amid towering trees and the stylish lounge, reminiscent of Paris in the roaring 1920s.

Located on the Left Bank - 'la Rive Gauche' in French - Le Cinq Codet boasts a privileged position in the ritzy 7th arrondissement, just around the corner from the iconic Les Invalides and an easy walk to the glittering, majestic Eiffel Tower as well as the gem of Musée Rodin's sculpture-filled mansion and gardens. One of the most elegant and high-end parts of Paris, the 7th Arrondissement promises a jewellery box of exquisite boutiques, restaurants and cafes wedged alongside iconic buildings and stately monuments.

title: Top-Rated Designer Apartment Stay in Paris' Trendy 9th Arrondissement
description:
Live like a true Parisian staying in a fabulously-located apartment in the 9th arrondissement at Résidence Nell, one of the top-rated apartment properties in Paris on TripAdvisor. Relax in comfort at this home-away-from-home with stunning views over the instantly recognisable, monument-lined boulevards and experience a city that exists in the mind long before one visits. Be seduced by postcard-perfect sights, glamorous avenues, lamplit bridges, Art Nouveau cafés and bistros that dot every street corner.

Your escape includes daily continental breakfast, a complimentary half-bottle of Champagne and macarons on arrival.

title: Elegant Paris Retreat near Champs-Elysees with Acclaimed Restaurant & Daily Breakfast
description:
Find yourself in a refined city hideaway just steps from the Champs-Elysees and the iconic Arc itself. With its sleek Haussmann-era foundations and elegant interiors by Studio Putman, Sofitel Paris Arc de Triomphe brings architectural polish to one of the city’s most coveted corners.

Start your day with house-baked viennoiseries at Les Cocottes Arc de Triomphe, the hotel’s seasonal bistro by award-winning French culinary legend Christian Constant. By evening, settle into Bar Sorsi for aperitivo hour, where Italian-leaning cocktails and small plates flow as easily as the conversation. And if you’re staying in, 24-hour in-room dining delivers Parisian flair straight to your door.

title: Five-Star Boutique Escape in Trendy 9th Arrondissement
description: Experience Paris like a local, staying in the most glamorous part of the city, home to theatres, museums and boutique shops. Spend your days exploring art galleries and museums, sampling cheeses and macarons, and sipping wine by the river. Then retreat to the five-star Parister Hotel, rated among the best hotels in the world. Indulge in a memorable trip to France’s capital and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a cocktail each during your stay at the chic Les Passerelles cocktail bar and a welcome juice and candle on arrival.

title: Refined Parisian Art Deco Hotel near Arc de Triomphe with Daily Breakfast & Spa Access
description:
Inspired by the visionary designs of Jacques-Emile Ruhlmann from the illustrious 1925 Universal Exhibition, the Hotel du Collectionneur stands as a masterpiece of architectural splendour. This lavish hideaway brings Art Deco elegance back to life, celebrating the majestic private mansions of the Second Empire and offering a nostalgic journey into the golden age of style.

Indulge in this hotel's world-class facilities, uncover new realms of relaxation at Spa du Collectionneur by Paoma et Decorte and savour French culinary classics, including steak frites and mouthwatering creme brulee at the hotel's onsite restaurant. As night falls, the bar invites you to enjoy cocktails in a setting reminiscent of a Parisian speakeasy, promising an extraordinary stay that's nothing short of unforgettable.

Perfectly positioned in the chic 8th arrondissement, this hotel underwent a meticulous seven-year renovation, establishing it as the iconic landmark it is today. It grants seamless access to the Arc de Triomphe, Parc Monceau and the elegant boutiques of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore, along with front-row seats to the Eiffel Tower's twinkling lights.

title: Intimate Paris Haven near Notre Dame Cathedral with Daily Breakfast, Spa Access & Private Garden
description:
Extended by popular demand! Located in the heart of Paris, Les Jardins du Marais redefines boutique luxury with a discreet facade that hides a world of refined elegance. Take a break in Le Bar and discover a selection of cocktails and fine wines in a charming ambience, or head to the Spa du Marais, a radiant exposed stone and marble sanctuary that promises a blissful escape.

Step outside into one of Paris' most remarkable private terraces, a surprising green oasis that plays masterfully with space and light. Inside, the hotel's intimate cinema offers a unique personal movie experience. Just moments away, the Place des Vosges invites you to admire 17th-century architecture, while the world-renowned Centre Pompidou stands ready to dazzle art enthusiasts.

title: Fashionable Boutique Escape in Paris
description: Experience Parisian style and romance in the heart of the city with three nights staying at the newly opened Hotel Dress Code. Includes daily continental buffet breakfasts, mocktails on arrival and one hour of indulgence in the hotel’s spa which features a hammam and indoor swimming pool.
offer_address: 5 Rue de Caumartin, 9e arr., 75008 Paris, France

title: Five-Star Paris Luxury in the Elegant 9th Arrondissement with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience Paris like a local, staying in the most glamorous part of the city: the 9th arrondissement, home to theatres, boutiques and gourmet dining. Spend your days exploring art galleries and museums, sampling cheeses and macarons, and sipping wine by the river. Then retreat to the five-star Parister Hotel to relax in boutique luxury. Indulge in a memorable trip to France’s capital and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a welcome drink and gift on arrival and a cocktail each at Les Passerelles restaurant and cocktail bar.

title: Boutique 1960s Inspired Luxury Paris Escape near Arc de Triomphe with Daily Breakfast
description:
Tucked away in Paris' affluent Faubourg-du-Roule neighbourhood, seconds away from the famed Avenue des Champs-Élysées, this hotel is the epitome of boutique charm with a dash of Parisian flair. A refined example of 1960s Parisian chic, every corner whispers tales of the city's artistic legacy with seamlessly modern furnishings.

Hôtel Norman caters to every indulgence, from the onsite bar where visitors can enjoy a glass of fine French wine to nearby patisseries serving dream-worthy pastries. Explore the winding alleys around the Sacré-Cœur Basilica, filled with quaint cafes, hidden art studios and energetic street performers as you discover the bohemian allure of the city that has inspired artists, writers and musicians for generations.

title: Boutique Paris Luxury near Champs-Elysees with Daily Breakfast
description:
Be one of the first to experience Parisian elegance in the city's heart at this brand-new boutique hotel just steps from the glitz and glamour of the Champs-Elysees and the Arc de Triomphe. Part of the prestigious Relais & Chateaux collection of luxury hotels, at this sophisticated five-star escape exclusive classic French dining, first-class service and exquisite heritage features are the order of the day.

Spend your days wandering along the Seine and strolling past the city's most fashionable boutiques, art galleries and world-renowned dining before returning to savour gourmet French cuisine at the Michelin-starred restaurant, Pierre Gagnaire, or sip on a classic cocktail at the intimate lobby bar. With just 58 rooms and suites, the hotel feels like your own little slice of private Parisian heaven.

title: Boutique Luxury in Paris with Daily Breakfast
description: Experience the beauty of the world's most romantic city, staying in an arty boutique hotel inspired by a 19th-century French writer, Hotel Monte Cristo, just south of the River Seine in Paris’ historic fifth arrondissement. Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast, a welcome in-room flavoured rum taster and a welcome gift in your room.

title: Boutique Paris Luxury near Champs-Elysees with Daily Breakfast & Onsite Spa
description:
Experience Parisian elegance in the city's heart at this boutique hotel just steps from the glitz and glamour of the Champs-Elysees. As part of the prestigious Relais & Chateaux collection of luxury hotels, this sophisticated five-star escape offers classic French dining, first-class service and exquisite heritage features as the hallmarks of your stay.

Hotel Balzac Paris feels like your own slice of Parisian heaven. Spend your days wandering along the Seine, strolling past the city's fashionable boutiques, art galleries and world-renowned dining spots. Return to savour gourmet French cuisine at the Michelin-starred restaurant Pierre Gagnaire, and finish your night with a cocktail at the intimate lobby bar.

title: Boutique Designer Stay In Paris
description: See Paris like a real Parisian, staying in the most glamorous part of the city, home to theatres, museums and boutique shops. Spend your days exploring art galleries and museums, tasting cheeses and macarons, sipping wine by the river - then retreat to the sophisticated Nell Hotel & Suites, Paris' top-rated apartment hotel. With daily continental breakfast, champagne on arrival and stunning views over the iconic French buildings, Nell Hotel will make your stay in Paris the most memorable one yet.

title: High-End Paris Boutique Former Home of Writer Simone de Beauvoir with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the essence of Parisian charm at the luxurious Maison Colbert Meliá Collection, once the residence of renowned French writer Simone de Beauvoir. This 16th-century building is steeped in rich history: immerse yourself in the visionary design by acclaimed architects Alvaro Sans and Adriana Sans and enjoy the iconic masterworks of Spanish painter Joaquin Sorolla. Recently awarded the best art boutique hotel in Europe in 2022, it offers an unparalleled fusion of artistic excellence and timeless elegance right in the heart of Paris, leaving you central to all famous landmarks.

Spend your days wandering along the Seine and strolling the Latin Quarter before returning to unwind on the hotel's terrace to enjoy a bite to eat at the charming onsite Café Clotilde, offering toasted sandwiches, gourmet Parisian pastries and signature cocktails. With just 39 rooms, the hotel feels like your own little slice of private Parisian heaven.
offer_address: Rue de l'Hôtel Colbert, 75005 Paris, France

title: Paris MGallery Boutique Luxury in the Bastille District with Daily Breakfast & Hammam Access
description: Experience quintessential Parisian luxury at the five-star Hôtel Paris Bastille Boutet - MGallery, located in the vibrant, central Bastille district. Part of the exclusive MGallery portfolio, this boutique retreat - housed within the walls of a former chocolate factory - is a stone’s throw from the buzzing Le Marais and within easy reach of the city's main attractions, including the Louvre Museum, Notre Dame and River Seine. After days exploring the city, cap off your evening with craft cocktails at Bar Boutet, retreat to the hotel's indoor pool or indulge in a bespoke treatment in CODAGE Spa's refreshing hammam.

title: Stylish Parisian Boutique Hotel near Montmartre with Daily Breakfast & Daily Spa Access
description:
Tucked away in the 10th arrondissement, this boutique hotel is a genuine Parisian gem. With elegant rooms, a wellness spa to melt your stress away and a bar to toast the city, this is the perfect stay for unwinding after a day of sightseeing. The lobby and courtyard ooze Parisian charm with bespoke furniture, creating a stylish atmosphere that captures the city's timeless elegance.

Set in a bustling neighbourhood, The Louvre Museum and Sacré-Cœur are just a stone's throw away, while Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est train stations are practically on your doorstep. If you fancy a leisurely stroll, head to Canal Saint-Martin for picture-perfect cafes, lose yourself in Le Marais's trendy boutiques, or sample authentic French bistros on Boulevard de Magenta.
offer_address: 7 Rue des Petits Hôtels, Paris 75010, France

title: Artistic Paris City Break in Heart of Latin Quarter with Daily Breakfast
description:
Nestled in the heart of Paris’ iconic Odéon and Saint-Germain-des-Prés districts, this cultural residence radiates a captivating bohemian spirit, steeped in artistic heritage. For decades this hotel has welcomed musicians, actors and visionaries, fostering a creative energy that defines its unique charm. With the Seine River within easy reach, this boutique gem offers the perfect base to explore the city's rich history and culture.

Transformed by acclaimed designer Chloé Nègre, the hotel seamlessly blends vintage elegance with contemporary comfort. Bespoke furniture, evocative lighting and thoughtful decorative touches create an atmosphere that celebrates its storied past while embracing modern luxury. Sample authentic French cuisine at the nearby Café de Flore, stroll through the enchanting Luxembourg Gardens, or delve into the world of literature at the heritage Shakespeare and Company bookstore.
offer_address: 66 Rue Saint-André des Arts, 75006 Paris, France

title: Stylish Parisian Boutique Escape near Montmartre with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drink
description:
Tucked away in the 10th arrondissement, this boutique hotel is a genuine Parisian gem. With elegant rooms that echo French sophistication and all the modern comforts you could desire, this is the perfect stay for unwinding after a day of sightseeing in the City of Love.

The lobby and courtyard ooze Parisian charm with bespoke furniture, creating a stylish atmosphere that captures the city's timeless elegance. Melt your stresses away at the spa with an indulgent massage or sauna session, or settle in with a good book in the library nook. Begin mornings with a buffet breakfast and toast to the city come evening at Mademoiselle Bar.

Set in a bustling neighbourhood, The Louvre Museum and Sacré-Cœur are just a stone's throw away, while Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est train stations are practically on your doorstep. title: Boutique Parisian Elegance near Arc de Triomphe & Champs-Élysées with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the romance of the City of Light with a stay at this refined heritage escape, housed in a charming 19th-century Haussmann building. Ideally located just moments from the world-renowned Arc de Triomphe and the high-end Champs-Élysées avenue, the best of Paris is right on your doorstep.

In between exploring the French capital, lounge by the fireplace in one of two elegant drawing rooms, adorned with leather and wool sofas, black marble floors, bronze light fixtures and solid oak details, and enjoy a glass of wine once the space turns into a bar.

With Charles de Gaulle - Étoile metro station just a few minutes away, you’ll have easy access to explore Paris’s rich history and culture: visit the iconic Louvre Museum nearby or enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Seine. Delight in French cuisine at a local brasserie or simply sip on a cafe au lait as you watch the world go by.
offer_address: 6 Rue du Général Lanrezac, Paris 75017, France

title: Chic Boutique Escape in the Heart of Paris with Traditional Turkish Bathhouse, Daily Breakfast & Drinks Credit
description:
Treat yourself to the romantic charm of Paris with an elegant escape at Hôtel and Spa La Belle Juliette, lovingly decorated with all the glamour of a 19th-century salon. Nestled in the heart of the city's sophisticated Saint-Germain-des-Pres district, this boutique hotel offers a tranquil retreat amidst the buzz of the city. Succumb to the allure of French cuisine at Clos Belle Juliette restaurant, serving traditional dishes in the al fresco surrounds of the terrace. Explore the surrounding area, brimming with elegant designer boutiques, art galleries and historic landmarks. A stone's throw away, discover the Luxembourg Gardens or the iconic Notre Dame Cathedral.

Unwind in the moody interior of the chic Spa La Belle Juliette, where luxury and self-care combine to create a serene oasis. Enjoy a relaxing float through the waters of the indoor pool, equipped with massaging hydro jets. Or, spend hours in the softly lit Turkish bath decorated with traditional mosaic tiles, or book a personalised facial treatment with the talented team of therapists (surcharges apply).
location_description: Hôtel and Spa La Belle Juliette
offer_address: 92 Rue du Cherche Midi, Paris 75006, France

title: Intimate Boutique Paris Haven with Daily Breakfast, Spa & Private Garden
description:
Located in the heart of Paris, Les Jardins du Marais redefines boutique luxury with a discreet facade that hides a world of refined elegance. Take a break in Le Bar and discover a selection of cocktails and fine wines in a charming ambience, or head to the Spa du Marais, a radiant exposed stone and marble sanctuary that promises a blissful escape.

Inside, the hotel's intimate cinema offers a unique personal movie experience. title: Hillside MGallery Glamour Overlooking Paris with Daily Breakfast & Guaranteed Room Upgrade
description:
Situated at the gateway to Paris, let the timeless elegance of Domaine Reine Margot Paris Issy - MGallery Collection envelop you in its warm ambience and historic charm. This chic stay is steeped in regal charm, from its verdant Parisian surrounds to the heritage-styled speakeasy bar, The Monastic. From morning to night, dine as you please at the hotel's acclaimed restaurant, Marguerite 1606, where traditional French cuisine meets contemporary flair, or unwind in the sparkling pool, inviting sauna or tranquil spa.

Spend the day exploring the enchanting city of Paris from the Louvre Museum to the glittering Eiffel Tower. For countryside tranquillity, explore the nearby Chateau de Chenonceau, a masterpiece of the French Renaissance, or relax in a variety of green spaces and tranquil parklands surrounding France's capital city.
location_description: Domaine Reine Margot Paris Issy - MGallery Collection
offer_address: 3 Cours de la Reine, Margot Issy les Moulineaux, Paris 92130, France

title: Contemporary Parisian Luxury in the Heart of the City’s Art Scene with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience an artistic escape at the Drawing House, a unique gem nestled in the Paris' 14th arrondissement. This boutique stay has contemporary drawing at its core, with the hotel's walls covered in the creations of a variety of artists - whether in the onsite exhibition space, the hallways of each floor or in the rooms themselves. The hotel's unique love of art forges creativity and wonder amid the city's inspiring surroundings; museums, art galleries and the Catacombs of Paris are all within walking distance. After a day of exploration, retreat to the colourful hotel's chic bar for a refreshing drink or savour the gastronomic delights of the onsite restaurant, serving authentic Parisian cuisine with a heartfelt homemade twist.

Treat yourself to a relaxing visit to the Drawing House Spa, housing a refreshing indoor pool surrounded by the artistic work of Marion Charlet. Succumb to the hands of world-class masseuses and unwind in the steam of the sauna. Paris is the place to wander the streets, indulge in freshly baked pastries and shop to your heart's content.

title: Provencal Paris Boutique City Break near Champs-Elysees with Daily Breakfast
description:
Perfectly positioned just moments from the Champs-Elysees and iconic Arc de Triomphe, this Provence-inspired boutique hotel brings the cosy calm of France’s sun-kissed southeast to Paris’s bustling heart. With just 49 summer-themed rooms, Villa Alessandra offers intimate hospitality at every level, from a buffet breakfast showcasing flaky croissants and pain au chocolate.

Ready to explore? One of the city’s most underrated markets, the covered Market des Ternes - and a world of sumptuous soft cheeses, crispy-soft baguettes and more - is just around the corner. A little further and you’ll find yourself in the tree-lined Champs-Elysees, the city’s most iconic district, and its abundance of luxury shopping boutiques, renowned patisseries, prestigious perfume-makers and artisan macaron houses.

title: Boutique Paris Glamour Minutes from the Champs-Elysées with Daily Breakfast
description:
Like a Parisian dream, this heritage hotel in the elegant eighth arrondissement is the pinnacle of regal romance. Part of the exclusive Meliá Collection portfolio, this boutique stay is the former residence of the French aristocracy and has managed to retain its glamorous legacy while providing modern comfort and avant-garde design.

Live your City of Light daydreams as you wander charming city streets peppered with architectural marvels - the luxurious clothing boutiques of the Champs-Elysees, the iconic Eiffel Tower and the serene riverbanks of the Seine are all just an easy stroll away. After days exploring the city, cap off your evening with a taste of Franco-Spanish fusion dining at the lavish Dos Almas Restaurant, before retreating to the secluded tranquility of your glamorous room.

title: Paris 18th-Century Luxury Mansion on Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré with Daily Breakfast
description:
Step into the heart of Parisian grandeur at this luxurious five-star sanctuary, nestled in the prestigious 8th arrondissement, Paris' fashion and cultural epicentre. Set within a magnificent Haussmannian building, constructed in 1734, this hotel is an architectural masterpiece that exudes the rich heritage of Paris, offering just 56 rooms and suites for an intimate experience.

After a day immersed in the city’s history and allure, retreat to the storied courtyard of the Delano Café, helmed by the celebrated French chef Thierry Marx. At this culinary gem, Marx skillfully blends the finest French and Mediterranean flavours into each dish, offering a feast for the senses. For cocktail aficionados, the Delano Bar offers an extraordinary selection of French wines, spirits, vermouths and bitters.

A crown jewel in the exclusive Delano collection, this hotel boasts a location of unparalleled prestige. Steps away, you’ll find Paris’ most famous landmarks, from the Champs-Élysées to the world-famous Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré. This legendary avenue is a haven for luxury, hosting the Hermès flagship alongside renowned fashion houses such as Comme des Garçons, Givenchy, Chanel, Cartier and Gucci.

title: Five-Star Designer Stay Near the Eiffel Tower
description: Experience understated, artistic elegance just five minutes’ drive from the striking Eiffel Tower at the stunning Hôtel Le Cinq Codet located on the Left Bank. Experience quintessential Parisian style in a 1930’s architectural haven and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, welcome glass of Champagne on arrival and a welcome box of in-room chocolates on arrival. Suite upgrade with tickets for a scenic Seine River cruise available.
location_description: Hôtel Le Cinq Codet OLD OLD

title: Peaceful Parisian Wellness Escape near Latin Quarter with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Wine & Spa Access
description:
Tucked away in the heart of the City of Light, Hôtel Villa Romantic & Spa is where Parisian dreams come to life. The real showstopper is the to-die-for wellness sanctuary with its gleaming pool and jacuzzi, heavenly mosaic Turkish bath and sauna with a Himalayan salt wall that will transport you from city bustle to blissful escape in a moment.

Wander into the jasmine-scented courtyard and you've stumbled upon Paris' best-kept secret - a breath of fresh air in the urban jungle. Here, cosy corners beckon for stolen moments with a glass of Bordeaux or that page-turner you've been meaning to finish. This little slice of heaven hits all the right notes with chic lounges and rooms that whisper "je t'aime".

title: Chic Boutique Stay in Paris’ Bohemian 13th District
description: Enjoy a chic getaway at C.O.Q Hotel Paris, located in the city’s bohemian 13th district. Mere metres from Place d’Italie and the metro station, you’ll be in the perfect location for exploring this unique, artsy part of Paris. Included in your city break is a daily buffet breakfast of French delicacies, a refreshing welcome drink and luxe complimentary bathroom products from premium brand RITUALS waiting in your room on arrival.

title: Romantic Parisian Escape
description: Fall in love with the City of Romance, staying at the cool and contemporary five-star Renaissance Paris Republique, close to the trendy and historic Le Marais district. Includes a VIP champagne welcome, daily breakfasts, a cruise on the River Seine, unlimited spa access and discounted treatments, bike rental and more.

vendor_name: Molitor Hotel & Spa Paris MGallery Collection
title: Paris Five-Star MGallery Luxury with the City's Most Iconic Pool & Daily Breakfast
description: Experience Paris like a local at Molitor Hotel & Spa Paris MGallery Collection, a five-star retreat home to Paris' most iconic swimming pool. Originally built in 1929 as a popular swimming baths venue, it was reborn as a luxury hotel, with the historic pools lovingly rebuilt. This avant-garde, chic haven is located in the most glamorous part of the city: the 16th arrondissement, home to renowned museums, the Arc de Triomphe, verdant parklands and gourmet dining. In between dips in the heated pool, and sips of champagne at the Bar, let off some steam in the relaxing hammam or pamper your palate at Brasserie Molitor for French classics with a modern twist.
location_description: Molitor Hotel & Spa Paris MGallery Collection

title: Sofitel Elegance Meets Historical Charm in Bastille
description: Experience quintessential Parisian style at the five-star Hôtel Paris Bastille Boutet - MGallery by Sofitel - located in the heart of the trendy Bastille district. Sitting away from the busy tourist areas and just a stone’s throw from the buzzing Le Marais, the hotel offers a genuine Parisian experience while being within easy reach of the city's main attractions including the Louvre Museum, Notre Dame and the River Seine. Includes daily buffet breakfast, welcome drink on arrival and welcome in-room sweets.

title: Paris 19th-Century Heritage Mansion within 8th Arrondissement near Champs-Elysees with Daily Breakfast
description:
Described as the "hidden gem in Paris’ 8th arrondissement" by Vogue, this resplendent 19th-century hotel particulier is your ideal base from which to experience the City of Love.

Hotel Alfred Sommier, the ancestral estate of a French sugar baron, has beautifully preserved original features that offer a romantic nod to its aristocratic past. Enjoy a meal in the grand drawing room, a parquet-floored salon adorned with Louis XV decor, or sip a tipple in The Bar, formerly the mansion's fumoir (smoking room). The menu at Restaurant Les Caryatides transports guests back in time with French dishes reminiscent of those once served to the Sommier family.

Built around a secluded private courtyard, this dreamy hotel is just steps from the grand Church of Sainte-Marie-Madeleine and a short stroll from the Place de la Concorde, Champs Elysees and the Louvre, with the scenic banks of the Seine only a 15-minute walk away.

title: Five-Star Paris Art Deco Stay Near the Eiffel Tower
description:

Daily, savour a quintessential French breakfast before embarking on an exploration of the glittering City of Lights.

**Upgrade** to a Junior Suite to enjoy tickets to a scenic Seine River cruise and a platter of cheese, cold meats and wine on the hotel's patio.

Live your City of Light daydreams as you wander charming city streets peppered with architectural marvels, with the luxurious clothing boutiques of the Champs-Elysees, the iconic Eiffel Tower, and the serene riverbanks of the Seine an easy stroll away. After days exploring the city, cap off your evening with a taste of Franco-Spanish fusion dining at the lavish Dos Almas Restaurant, before retreating to the secluded tranquillity of your glamorous room.

Experience a city that exists in the mind long before one visits, and seek solitude in this intimate and infinitely pleasing home-away-from-home while being seduced by the postcard-perfect sights, glamourous avenues, lamplit bridges, art nouveau cafés and lace-curtained bistros that dot every street corner.

Wake up to daily continental breakfast, and enjoy a complimentary half-bottle of champagne and macarons on arrival, plus stunning views over the instantly recognisable, monument-lined boulevards.

description:
History meets opulence in the shadow of France's most famous château at this five-star boutique hotel that occupies two carefully restored 17th-century pavilions. Whether you're here to tick Versailles off your bucket list, or fancy a quick zip into Paris, this place has got you covered. 

After a day of sightseeing, retreat to the hidden garden terrace, savour the refined dishes at La Table des Lumières restaurant, or loosen up with a flute of champagne in Le Bar des Philosophes. Then, surrender completely to the intimate spa where signature treatments blend French botanical traditions with modern techniques.

As part of the prestigious Relais & Chateaux collection of luxury hotels, this sophisticated five-star escape offers classic French dining, first-class service and exquisite heritage features as the hallmarks of your stay.

Hôtel Balzac Paris feels like your own slice of Parisian heaven. Spend your days wandering along the Seine, strolling past the city's fashionable boutiques, art galleries and world-renowned dining spots. Return to savour gourmet French cuisine at the Michelin-starred restaurant Pierre Gagnaire, and finish your night with a cocktail at the intimate lobby bar.

title: Paris Five-Star Boutique Luxury in the Stylish 9th Arrondissement with Daily Breakfast & Hammam Access
description:
Experience Paris like a local at Hôtel Parister - a five-star retreat located in the most glamorous part of the city: the 9th arrondissement, home to theatres, boutiques and gourmet dining.

Featuring an elegant collection of refined guestrooms and suites adorned in effortless Parisian design, this urban haven invites you to stay in unparalleled comfort and timeless beauty through its exceptional facilities: sip French whisky in the chic cocktail bar, let off some steam in the relaxing hammam or pamper your palate with lip-smacking dishes and homemade desserts at Les Passerelles restaurant.

title: Paris Palatial Art Deco Glamour near Arc de Triomphe with Daily Breakfast
description:
Inspired by the visionary designs of Jacques-Emile Ruhlmann from the illustrious 1925 Universal Exhibition, this lavish hotel stands as a masterpiece of architectural splendour. This Parisian escape brings Art Deco elegance back to life, celebrating the majestic private mansions of the Second Empire and offering a nostalgic journey into the golden age of style.

Indulge in world-class facilities and savour French culinary classics, including steak frites and mouthwatering creme brulee, at the hotel's onsite bar. As night falls, the bar invites you to enjoy cocktails in a setting reminiscent of a Parisian speakeasy, promising an extraordinary stay that's nothing short of unforgettable.

Perfectly positioned in the chic 8th arrondissement, this hotel underwent a meticulous seven-year renovation, establishing it as the iconic landmark it is today. It grants seamless access to the Arc de Triomphe, Parc Monceau and the elegant boutiques of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore, along with front-row seats to the Eiffel Tower's twinkling lights.

title: Romantic Paris Stay with Seine River Cruise
description: Fall in love with the City of Lights, staying at the cool, contemporary five-star Renaissance Paris Republique, close to the trendy and historic Le Marais district. Discover the magic of the world's most loved city in Marriott style with a VIP Champagne welcome, daily buffet breakfast, a cruise on the River Seine, unlimited spa access with discounted treatments and complimentary bike rental to explore Paris like a local.

title: Historic Five-Star Parisian Luxury Overlooking the Eiffel Tower with Daily Breakfast
description:
Once the former residence of Prince Roland Bonaparte and holding both Palace distinction and Monument Historique status, this emblematic Shangri-La hotel is the Parisian stay that dreams are made of. With its breathtaking views of the Eiffel Tower and sumptuous interiors that blend imperial elegance with modern luxury, Shangri-La Paris offers an unforgettable experience steeped in history and refined hospitality.

Located in the glamorous 16th Arrondissement, moments from the Seine River and the Jardins du Trocadéro, this endlessly enchanting hotel has Paris' landmarks at its doorstep. Within its palatial walls, you will find France's only Michelin-starred Chinese restaurant, an art-deco bar with authentic Absinthe fountains and a sun-soaked spa boasting a 17-metre indoor pool.

title: Luxe Boutique Heritage Hotel in the Heart of Paris
description:
With architectural masterpieces the Palais Garnier and the Louvre Museum nearby, there is no finer address to immerse yourself in the Parisian lifestyle than the luxe, boutique Hotel Edouard 7 Paris Opéra, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor.

The dazzling interiors of this opulent 1877 heritage retreat, awash with gold-trimmed paintings, bespoke velvet furnishings, and a list of impeccable facilities, including La Cuisine de l'E7 and elegant Bar E7, are just a taster of what awaits beyond the prestigious Avenue de l’Opéra. Just outside the front doors, the crème de la crème of Parisian landmarks and haute couture shopping awaits with the famed Galeries Lafayette and Printemps retail meccas, and Tuileries Garden all within a 10-minute stroll. The city of love doesn't get much better than this. Oui oui!

title: Five-Star Parisian Escape with All-Day Bar & Lounge

Venture over to the all-day Diamond Bar for signature cocktails, aperitifs and gourmet snacks in a sultry, romantic setting.

Elevate your Parisian adventure at one of the highest rooftops in the city, where a glass-cube panoramic restaurant and electrifying sky bar promise memories as spectacular as the views. Located in the dynamic 13th arrondissement, this MGallery gem also places you minutes from legendary landmarks like the Louvre and Notre Dame.

title: Boutique Heritage Paris Escape by the Champs-Élysées with Daily Breakfast
description:
From the Champs-Élysées and the Eiffel Tower to the meandering backstreets lined with boulangeries and boutiques - soak up the sights of Paris in style at the superb Hotel Vernet. Housed in a beautiful Parisian building showcasing glorious Belle Époque style, this prestigious hotel sits in the heart of the world-famous 8th arrondissement, where fashion, history and gourmet cuisine collide. This stylish neighbourhood is defined by the world-famous Champs-Élysées avenue (just a five-minute stroll from the hotel) and lies within easy reach of iconic attractions such as the Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe.

After a day spent getting lost amid the streets of Paris, step back in time as you enter the striking Hotel Vernet: a Haussmann-style building, designed specifically as a hotel in 1913. You’ll be sleeping in one of Paris’ most iconic properties, surrounded by over 100 years of history. Be dazzled by the carefully restored original features, which include classical columns, gilded marble fireplaces and a wrought-iron elevator. Outstanding service awaits at the incredible restaurant, serving gourmet cuisine and fine wines under a dome glass ceiling designed by Gustave Eiffel - attracting visitors and architecture fans from all over the world. It really doesn’t get more Parisian than this.

title: Elegant Five-Star Paris Escape with Views of the Eiffel Tower
description: Immerse yourself in the Parisian lifestyle and fall in love with Hotel du Collectionneur, a beautiful five-star escape in the heart of Paris. This hotel is the perfect location for a romantic getaway, as you absorb the passion of the city with a picnic beneath the sparking Eiffel Tower, or enjoy an elegant meal at the lavish Salvaje restaurant. Families can spend their days exploring the city highlights and return to this elegant hotel for an evening of indulgence and relaxation.
location_description: Hotel du Collectionneur - NOT IN USE

title: Quintessential Paris Sofitel Luxury Near Champs-Élysées with Onsite Spa & Dining
description:
Experience the epitome of Parisian elegance with a stay in the heart of the city's fashion district. The hotel is a stone's throw from the prestigious Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, home to renowned boutiques and the Elysée Palace. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's courtyard or indulge in a culinary journey at Blossom Restaurant, where French gastronomy is celebrated.

The hotel's location is ideal for art enthusiasts, with the Louvre Museum and the Grand Palais just a short stroll away. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel's wellness centre offers a tranquil escape, complete with a fitness centre and an array of rejuvenating treatments. In the evening, sip on expertly crafted cocktails at the stylish Le Bar du Faubourg, a favourite amongst the city's fashionable elite.

title: Chic Paris Apartment-Style Luxury near the Louvre with Two Restaurants & Tranquil Spa
description:
Wrap yourself in the Parisian-chic charms of this opulent Sofitel sanctuary, ideally situated in the heart of Paris' high-end Opera-Vendome district. Fabulously renovated by renowned designer Tristan Auer to mirror the style of a Parisian apartment, the hotel's accommodations are a true embodiment of French luxury and comfort.

Dine on creative cuisine at Rivages, enjoy a Parisian cafe experience at Scribe & Cie. and sip on cocktails from Rivages' half-moon bar. For a spot of pampering, head to the spa for holistic treatments before venturing into the City of Light. With the Louvre museum, Tuileries Garden and the luxury boutiques of Place Vendôme within easy reach, the best of the city is on your doorstep.

title: Paris City Centre Escape Close to Major Sights
description: Live out the Parisian dream when you stay at Holiday Inn Paris - Elysées, an IHG Hotel, which boasts an unbeatable location in the centre of Paris in the upscale shopping district near Champs-Elysées. Major sights like the Eiffel Tower, Palais Garnier and the Louvre Museum are within easy reach, while the metro station is just a two-minute walk away. Start your mornings in the communal dining hall for buffet breakfasts, while in-room dining has you covered the rest of the time.
location_description: Holiday Inn Paris Elysées, an IHG Hotel

title: Palatial Paris Raffles Opulence with Michelin-Starred Restaurant, Luxe Spa & Movie Theatre
description:
Step into a world where art and Parisian opulence meet at this iconic Philippe Starck-designed palatial hotel, situated moments from the Arc de Triomphe and the Champs-Elysees. Part of the esteemed Raffles group, this five-star haven blends bold architecture with an artistic soul, boasting elegant accommodations filled with contemporary artworks and unique touches like in-room acoustic guitars and mirror-concealed televisions.

Experience world-class dining at the Michelin-starred Il Carpaccio or Nobu's Matsuhisa Paris, where Japanese-Peruvian flavours dazzle the senses. Unwind with avant-garde treatments at the Raffles Spa & Wellness, featuring treatments from Dr. Barbara Sturm and 111 Skin, a hammam and a serene indoor pool. After a day of soaking up the charms of the City of Lights, sip on a well-crafted cocktail from the Long Bar, tour the onsite art gallery or indulge in a private screening at the hotel's movie theatre.

title: Sophisticated Paris Escape Moments from the Eiffel Tower & Trocadero
description: The Eiffel Tower seems close enough to touch when you stay at the Hotel Plaza Tour Eiffel, a high-end property that counts itself among the renowned Grands Hôtels Parisiens group. After a complete renovation, the fresh-faced hotel offers a romantic stay in Paris' Golden Triangle. Between adventures, order an aperitif at the marble-clad Bar Lounge, enjoy a decadent room service spread or walk five minutes to the Villa Thalgo & Spa for a hammam, spa treatment or dip in the pool.

title: Classic Parisian Boutique Escape near Jardin des Tuileries with Restaurant & Bar
description:
Nestled in the 8th arrondissement, Maison Delano Paris is a perfect mix of Parisian elegance and pared-back luxury. This boutique hotel offers 56 extraordinary rooms with curated furnishings and soft, minimalist designs. The intimate courtyard garden provides a peaceful retreat from Paris' urban pulse.

Step outside and Paris is at your fingertips. Stroll to iconic landmarks like the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées, or explore the boutique-lined streets of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré nearby. The neighbourhood is filled with Michelin-starred venues and exclusive galleries, while convenient metro access connects you to every Parisian treasure with ease.

title: Dazzling Parisian Elegance near River Seine and Notre-Dame Cathedral with Rooftop Dining & Spa
description:
Tucked in the heart of Paris’s 4th arrondissement, this stylish escape blends contemporary luxury with the city’s artistic and cultural pulse. SO/ Paris sees fine art and fashion collide across 162 luxuriously stylish rooms, all with views over the internal courtyard or the city's rooftops and landmarks.

Indulge in exceptional dining at Bonnie on the 15th floor, or head to the 16th floor bar and club, offering a sophisticated space to unwind with expertly crafted cocktails and panoramic views. For ultimate relaxation, the Maison CODAGE Spa provides the perfect balance of indulgence and rejuvenation.

Step outside and immerse yourself in the vibrant Parisian atmosphere. Stroll to nearby landmarks like Île Saint-Louis and Notre-Dame Cathedral, or wander through the historic Marais district, home to trendy boutiques, galleries and cafes.

title: Central Paris Elegant Escape near Gare Montparnasse
description: In the heart of Paris, voco Paris Montparnasse, an IHG Hotel, is the perfect retreat from which to explore the City of Love. Start your morning with a fine coffee and breakfast at 12 Grammes cafe or enjoy some quiet time in the courtyard garden. Indulge at nearby creperies, check out a captivating theatre show or splurge in the boutiques along Rue de Rennes. As the sun sets, enjoy romantic views of Paris from your comfortable room before a good night's sleep.

Inspired by the 1925 designs of Jacques-Emile Ruhlmann, this sophisticated hotel stands as a masterpiece of architectural splendour. Home to opulent rooms and suites, this lavish hideaway brings Art Deco elegance back to life, boasting the Le Collectionneur Restaurant and Bar, a speakeasy-style bar and a decadent restaurant.

Your position in the 8th arrondissement allows for seamless access to the Arc de Triomphe, Parc Monceau and the elegant boutiques of Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honore, along with front-row seats to the Eiffel Tower's twinkling lights.

description: Just a stone's throw from Paris' bustling city centre is Holiday Inn Express Paris - Canal De La Villette, an IHG Hotel. Perfectly perched on the edge of the city’s quaint marina and the trendy Villette neighbourhood, this modern hotel bears all the hallmarks of Holiday Inn comfort and convenience, while exploring all that the City of Love has to offer. Walk through hectares of ecological gardens, visit a one-of-a-kind music centre and admire The Geode cinema. Come evening, watch the hotel’s grand façade light up from afar or sip a drink at the Bar and Lounge while the water shimmers below.

title: Stylish Boutique Paris Escape near the Eiffel Tower & Trocadéro
description:
Tucked away on a quiet street moments from the iconic Trocadéro, this retreat offers an exceptional blend of sophistication and convenience. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or a business trip, this boutique, elegant haven is the perfect launchpad to the best of Paris. Be close to an array of bars, restaurants, museums, sculptures, gardens and fountains.

Unwind at the marble-clad Bar Lounge with an aperitif, or step outside for a short stroll to Paris' most renowned landmarks. From sweeping views of the Eiffel Tower to the charming streets of the 16th arrondissement, Hotel Plaza Tour Eiffel places you at the heart of the city's vibrant energy.

title: Five-Star Paris Stay in the Heart of the 1st Arrondissement
description:
Fall in love with the magic of Paris and live it up with a five-star stay at Castille Paris, superbly set in the heart of the 1st arrondissement - one of the city’s most-loved precincts filled with authentic cafés, high-end boutiques and galleries and within easy reach of the Louvre Museum, Place Vendôme and l’Avenue des Champs-Élysées. Each of the hotel’s 108 rooms or suites perfectly captures the essence of French elegance with either street or gorgeous courtyard views while the period artwork, Florentine patio and Roman fountain add a unique Italian-inspired twist, all while creating an intimate atmosphere.

Dine at L’Assaggio restaurant for a taste of elevated, Italian-inspired fare and savour dishes from the menu crafted by Michelin-starred chef Ugo Alciati or break up your day with an informal drink or creative cocktails at L'Assaggio Bar and Salon de Thé. The fitness centre is available for travellers looking to release some energy, and the courtyard is the perfect spot to rest and recharge after hours of exploring the nearby wonders.

title: Boutique Five-Star Riverside Paris Stay with Daily Breakfast
description:
The beauty of the world’s most romantic city is yours to embrace from Hôtel Montalembert, set in the heart of Paris' lively Saint-Germain-des-Prés precinct, on the Seine's Left Bank. You'll find some of Paris’ best galleries and museums, chic cafés, design stores, antique shops, ateliers and, of course, the iconic Seine on this classy hotel's doorstep. It's just a 15-minute walk across the river to the Louvre, with the Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triomphe a short drive away.

Housed in a carefully restored heritage building dating back to 1926, the hotel exudes French sophistication. From the beautifully decorated lobby fitted with plush velvet couches, dark wood touches and modern furniture, to the original spiral staircase dominating the entrance, Hôtel Montalembert seamlessly merges old-world glamour and modernity. With a restaurant onsite - a popular hotspot for local politicians and VIPs - a cosy bar area and exceptionally designed rooms with bespoke amenities, this is the place to be and be seen in Paris' enchanting 6th arrondissement.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions**  

- Wake up to **daily continental breakfast** with Parisian pastries and à la carte options
- Complimentary **in-room bottled water** 
- **20% discount on food and drinks** at the hotel’s restaurant and bar (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Want to celebrate your escape with a bottle of champagne on arrival?** Upgrade to a palatial Suite, spread over 40sqm and complete with a separate living area, where a bottle of champagne will be waiting for you on arrival.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Paris - Ch. De Gaulle Airport
title: Stylish Charles de Gaulle Airport Stay Only 30 Minutes from Paris
description: Touchdown in tres bien style with a stay at Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned in picturesque Roissy-en-France village, just a complimentary 10-minute shuttle bus ride from Paris-Charles de Gaulle International Airport. Perfect for layovers or a longer escape, this Holiday Inn’s location is a true win-win - return from adventures in Paris to easygoing bistro plates at PALM restaurant or cocktails on the hotel’s sun-kissed garden terrace.
location_description: Holiday Inn Paris CDG Airport, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Paris Escape Near Arc de Triomphe & Champs-Élysées
description:
Discover the magic of Paris and immerse yourself in the city’s unrivalled culture, couture and cuisine from a stylish base, the boutique five-star Hotel Napoleon, just steps from the Champs-Élysées and the Arc de Triomphe. Aptly named after one of France’s historic figures, the hotel effortlessly combines French elegance and vibrancy through its exquisite décor and exceptional amenities. The classically designed hotel features a collection of rooms and suites that embody signature Parisian flair, a sleek gym, and a modern onsite eatery and bar - perfect for a quick break in the lively heart of Paris.

With such a unique location, there’s no need to venture much further from your doorstep to explore acclaimed landmarks. Wander down the street to visit Parc Monceau, or venture a little further to reach the Louvre Museum or Eiffel Tower.

title: Parisian Glamour near the Champs Elysees with Onsite Bar & Restaurant
description: Set in a 19th-century Haussmannian building, Hotel Keppler offers French elegance just moments from the Champs Elysees. The glamorous hotel boasts designer interiors throughout, including in the chic dining room and the cosy Library Bar, complete with a roaring fireplace. When you aren't indulging in a massage or lounging in the sauna, explore Paris' world-renowned landmarks, all within walking distance.

title: Sophisticated Paris Retreat Near the River Seine
description: Feel the love in the most romantic city in the world with an enjoyable stay right in the heart of Porte de Saint-Cloud at the Holiday Inn Paris - Auteuil, an IHG Hotel. Situated just outside the city center, indulge in all the luxuries Paris has on offer. Live out your Parisian fantasy by jumping on the metro, just steps from the hotel’s front door, to the city’s most famous attractions: take in the Louvre by day and the Eiffel Tower by night.
location_description: Holiday Inn Paris - Auteuil, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Le Bristol Paris - an Oetker Collection Hotel
title: Timeless Parisian Elegance near Arc de Triomphe with Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Step into a world of Parisian chic at Le Bristol Paris, this grand dame of luxury hotels boasts 18th-century inspired interiors and impeccable service that will make you feel like royalty. Indulge in the hotel's four Michelin-starred dining venues, pamper yourself at the luxe spa, sip cocktails in the enchanting garden, or let the kids (and your inner child) hang out with Socrate, the resident cat.

Sitting pretty on one of Paris' most exclusive streets, this hotel puts the city at your fingertips. Shop 'til you drop at designer boutiques, stroll along the Champs-Élysées, or get your culture fix at the Louvre. After a day of exploring, unwind in the pool with Eiffel Tower views-talk about living the high life.
offer_address: 112 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, Paris 75008, France

title: Paris Romance with Exceptional Two-Michelin Starred Restaurant
description: Discover the city of love in style at the Mandarin Oriental, Paris, a property that exudes the elegance and style that characterise France's capital. This palace hotel is perfectly located among perfumed camellia trees in the heart of the city, with the Louvre Museum an easy amble away and the iconic Eiffel Tower waiting after just a short trip on the metro. An array of dining options includes the signature Sur Mesure Par Thierry Marx, awarded two Michelin Stars. Dining here is a must-do, sensory experience sure to make your Paris escape extra-special (reservations are recommended).

title: Paris Five-Star Historic Elegance within the 9th Arrondissement
description: Live like Parisian nobility in the fabulously-located InterContinental Paris le Grand, an IHG Hotel, overlooking the world-famous Palais Garnier opera house. Opened in 1862 and inaugurated under Napoleon III, this five-star hotel is at the heart of Parisian society. Elegantly appointed, this Second Empire property defines grandeur with its dining options, including the iconic Café de la Paix, boutique-style suites and stunning views of the instantly recognisable, monument-lined boulevards.
location_description: InterContinental Paris le Grand, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Paris - Gare De Lyon Bastille
title: Elegant Historic Escape in the Heart of Paris
description: Escape to the romantic icon that is Paris with a stay at Holiday Inn Paris - Gare De Lyon Bastille, an IHG Hotel, located in a spectacular Belle Epoque building in the heart of the city. Explore the art and history that Paris is known for as you wander down to the River Seine and head to galleries and museums, or indulge in the high-end fashion of Avenue des Champs-Elysees. End your night with a quintessential glass of champagne at Bar 1913.
location_description: Holiday Inn Paris - Gare de Lyon Bastille, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Paris Hotel Stay in the Northern Gateway District
description: Say bonjour to the Parisian lifestyle with a city stay at Holiday Inn Paris - Porte De Clichy, an IHG Hotel. Before heading out to explore some of the most well-known monuments in Europe’s history, enjoy a quintessentially French breakfast at the onsite Eden buffet and terrace, featuring fluffy croissants, fresh seasonal fruits and hot coffee.
location_description: Holiday Inn Paris - Porte de Clichy, an IHG Hotel

title: Elegant Five-Star Paris Mansion Stay near the Champs-Élysées
description:
Live like Parisian royalty at the elegant Hotel de Sers, a five-star, 19th-century mansion standing proudly in the ever-so-stylish 8th arrondissement. Just 400m from the iconic Champs-Élysées avenue, this heritage hotel couldn’t be closer to the action: stroll the world-famous boulevard towards the Arc de Triomphe or Eiffel Tower, or turn your back on the tourist attractions to discover the local laneways and stylish streets of the neighbourhood. You’ll be seduced by the traditional bistros, pretty patisseries, beautiful boutiques and jaw-dropping architecture that dot every corner.

Rooms and suites at Hotel de Sers strike a balance between classic French style and modern living, with some boasting panoramic terraces that overlook the Eiffel Tower. Dine under the Parisian sky at Restaurant de Sers, where a tree-lined courtyard features a moveable glazed roof, or settle into the sophisticated S’Bar for classic and contemporary cocktails. Sweat it all out at the sauna and hammam, or escape the busy Paris lifestyle for a few hours with a bespoke spa treatment in your room. Should you venture outside the mansion’s art-lined walls, the in-house Clefs d’Or concierge is on hand to unlock unforgettable experiences in every part of the City of Lights.
offer_address: 41 avenue Pierre 1er de Serbie, 75008 Paris, France

title: Romantic Paris Retreat near the Palais Garnier
description: Escape for a romantic retreat to the City of Love and fall for the Kimpton St Honoré Paris, an IHG Hotel. Experience authentic and awe-inspiring Paris as you take to the streets to visit the famous Arc de Triomphe and the Eiffel Tower. Luxuriate at the Spa CODAGE Paris or take a dip in the heated indoor pool. Unwind after a long day of exploration by savouring a sophisticated cocktail as you enjoy unrivalled 360-degree views of Paris from the Sequoia rooftop bar and garden.
location_description: Kimpton St Honoré Paris, an IHG Hotel

title: Quintessential Paris Sofitel Luxury Near Champs-Elysées with Exquisite Onsite Dining
description:
Nestled near the elegant Champs-Élysées, this 5-star Sofitel hotel invites indulgence in Parisian luxury. With the striking elegance of a Haussmannian façade and interiors curated by renowned designers, this haven blends warmth and sophistication. Revel in breathtaking Paris views, explore world-class museums, and indulge in high fashion throughout the famous 8th arrondissement.

Unwind in rooms and suites designed for relaxation. Savour famous chef Christian Constant's bistro-style creations at Les Cocottes Arc de Triomphe Restaurant, where exquisite cuisine meets a relaxed, sunlit ambience. This is an invitation to experience Paris at its finest.

vendor_name: Nest Hotel Paris la Défense - MGallery Collection
title: Designer Paris Luxury near River Seine with Onsite Dining & Bar
description:
Experience designer style and Parisian charm at this urban oasis in the city's high-end business district. Ideally located within easy reach of cultural and architectural gems, this stylish retreat is a stone's throw from the iconic La Grande Arche de la Défense and the chic Les Quatre Temps shopping centre. 

Below a glass roof bathing the space in natural light, indulge in French gastronomy at the sophisticated Ô Mazette! restaurant. Maintain your routine at the well-equipped gym, savour fine wines and refreshing cocktails at the chic bar and rest in complete comfort in your chic room or suite.
location_description: Nest Hotel Paris la Défense - MGallery Collection
offer_address: 33 Voie des Sculpteurs, 34 Cours Michelet, Paris La Defense 92060, France

title: Historic Five-Star Parisian Luxury Overlooking the Eiffel Tower with Michelin Star Restaurant
description:
Once the former residence of Prince Roland Bonaparte and holding both Palace distinction and Monument Historique status, this emblematic Shangri-La hotel is the Parisian stay that dreams are made of. 

Located in the glamorous 16th Arrondissement, moments from the Seine River and the Jardins du Trocadéro, this endlessly enchanting hotel has Paris' landmarks at its doorstep. Within its palatial walls, you will find France's only Michelin-starred Chinese restaurant, an art-deco bar with authentic Absinthe fountains and a sun-soaked spa boasting a 17-metre indoor pool.

title: Contemporary Parisian Escape near Notre Dame Cathedral with Restaurant, Day Spa & Private Gardens
description:
Nestled in the heart of Paris, this Art Deco-inspired escape redefines luxury with a discreet facade that hides a world of refined elegance. Take a break in Le Bar and discover a selection of cocktails and fine wines in a charming ambience, or relax at the tranquil Spa du Marais, a sanctuary of exposed stone and marble.

Step outside to one of Paris’ most exceptional private terraces, a surprising green oasis that plays masterfully with space and light. Inside, the hotel’s intimate cinema offers an exclusive movie experience. Just moments away, the historic Place des Vosges invites you to admire 17th-century architecture, while the world-renowned Centre Pompidou stands ready to dazzle art enthusiasts.

title: Sophisticated Paris Escape Overlooking the Place de la République
description: Discover a charming blend of historic elegance and modern sophistication at Crowne Plaza Paris-Republique, an IHG Hotel. Located in the 11th arrondissement, use this stylish hotel as your launchpad to explore the city of love. The quintessential Louvre Museum and stunning Notre Dame Cathedral are only a short drive away, while other attractions are easily accessible by metro. Enjoy classic French cuisine in the chic Restaurant Le Dix or toast to your stay on the sun-soaked terrace.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Paris - Republique, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 10 Place De La Republique, Paris 75011, France

title: Paris Five-Star Glamour with World-Renowned Yakuza Paris by Olivier Restaurant
description: The City of Light is a dream destination - and the five-star Maison Albar Hotel Le Vendome Paris is your chance to live your French fantasies. Spacious rooms decked in gilding and marble look out over the romantic neighbourhood, while innovative dining awaits at Japanese-meets-Mediterranean Yakuza Paris by Olivier, the first French restaurant installation of acclaimed chef Olivier Da Costa. When it's time to be pampered, enter the soothing Spa Vendome for a massage.

title: Boutique Paris Designer Luxury with City-View Rooftop Cocktail Bar
description:
Experience timeless French elegance in the heart of Paris at Hôtel des Grands Boulevards. Designed by Dorothée Meilichzon, all 50 rooms are as unique as they are beautiful, overlooking either the gorgeous interior courtyard or truly Parisian boulevard. Franco-Italian cuisine by renowned chef Giovanni Passerini is served in the glass-topped restaurant, while The Shell bar is on hand for cosy drinks by the roaring fireplace. If you feel like a drink with a view, head up to the rooftop, where The Shed bar serves up creative craft cocktails and romantic panoramas of Paris’ 2nd arrondissement.

Founded by the innovative Experimental Group, Hôtel des Grands Boulevards exudes glamour, offering an exciting culinary scene and contemporary hospitality. You can expect a sultry cocktail bar fit for Marie Antoinette, gorgeous canopy beds and marble bathrooms reminiscent of an 18th-century Parisian palace, while smart amenities like mirrored televisions, in-room espresso machines and bedside USB plugs will keep you firmly in the 21st century.

title: Boutique Paris Montmarte Stay near Sacré-Cœur with Onsite Fine-Dining Restaurant
description:
Fall in love with Grand Pigalle Hotel, a charming Art Deco abode tucked away in Paris' sought-after South Pigalle neighbourhood (or SoPi), a cosmopolitan and festive quarter in the 9th arrondissement, conquered by trendsetting Parisians. Housed in a classically Haussmannian building at the corner of street Victor-Massé and Henry Monnier, this luxurious hotel embodies the revival of this historic neighbourhood. Each of the 37 exquisitely appointed boutique rooms conveys its unique personality through a design of geometric prints, deep emerald walls and opulent brass finishes.

Bordered by the popular Montmarte and Opéra districts, South Pigalle is the finest place to embrace authentic art de vivre. By day, stroll the leafy streets lined with concept fashion houses and quaint cafés; by night, neon-lit laneways become animated with eclectic cocktail bars, progressive bistros and, of course, the iconic Moulin Rouge - located less than a 10-minute walk away. When you're not fine-dining at the hotel's indulgent Frenchie Pigalle restaurant (spearheaded by Michelin-starred chef Gregory Marchand), head out to explore some of the city's most iconic sights, from the Eiffel Tower to the Louvre and stunning Sacré-Cœur - which is only 15 minutes' walk away.

title: Five-Star Art-Inspired Paris Riverside Luxury with Daily Breakfast
description:
You are invited to discover the charms of Paris’ most lively neighbourhood, Saint-Germain-des-Prés, on the Seine's Left Bank, from an ultra-modern five-star base: Hotel Bel Ami. Packed with quintessential Parisian spirit and a bohemian atmosphere, Saint-Germain-des-Prés is one of the city’s most-loved precincts, filled with chic cafés, boutique shops and art galleries, and just 15 minutes' walk from the Louvre.

Set within the walls of what once was a popular Parisian printworks, boasting an excellent address close to all the city has on offer, the hotel has kept its original French look on the outside, but the inside has been converted into a designer’s dream. Curated by some of the most renowned designers in the country, the hotel is filled with retro furnishings, vivid colours, quirky art installations and five-star amenities. After days of exploring, soothe your body and soul at the spa, sip cocktails at the elegant bar and relax in one of the contemporary rooms on offer - all complete with luxe facilities, bold design and bespoke furniture.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Wake up to **daily continental breakfast** with Parisian pastries and à la carte options
- **Bottled water** in your room on arrival (for stays of 2+ nights)
- **20% discount on food and drinks** at the hotel’s restaurant and bar (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to a Deluxe Room or a Suite and one child (aged 11 years and under) stays free on a sofa bed with breakfast included.
